message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to let it go for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to go a little lower, but $135 is my final price. It's a great deal for a product worth so much to you!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130 again?
